notYetEligible: Ntabwo ufite uburenganzira bwo gutanga. Komeza kubika kandi uzagera ku ntego yawe vuba!
reachedMilestone: Wagezeho intego yawe y'amezi 6 yo kubika. Ni igihe cyo gukora itandukaniro!
commitmentExplanation: Nk'igice cy'isezerano rya AidVault, 20% y'ubwizigame bwawe ijya ku burezi bw'abana. Urashobora guhitamo gutanga byinshi niba ubishaka!
confirmationText: Ndabyumva ko impano yanjye ya {{amount}} RWF izajya bitaziguye ku gufasha uburezi bw'abana no gutanga ibikoresho by'ishuri ku bakeneye.
makingRealDifference: Impano yawe irimo gukora itandukaniro nyayo mu buzima bw'abana.
cycleReset: Uruziga rwawe rwo kubika rwatangiye bushya. Tangira kubika ukundi kandi ukore ingaruka mu mezi 6!
confirmationRequired: Nyamuneka emeza ko wumva uko impano izakoreshwa
invalidAmount: Impano ntoya ni {{amount}} RWF (20% y'ubwizigame bwawe)
